cause.description:
The Stennis Foundation is a nonprofit organization committed to raising awareness of the Leukodystrophies, and funds for Leukodystrophies research. With your help, we are "One Step Closer to a Cure!"
1. The Leukodystrophies are a group of rare brain-degenerative diseases that strip away myelin.
2. The Leukodystrophies are fatal.
3. We must advance towards a cure.
cause.mission: Raise awareness of the Leukodystrophies, and raise funds for Leukodystrophies Research
cause.name: The Stennis Foundation
